title: Connect to Amazon MemoryDB for Redis from AWS Lambda
description: This snippet demonstrates how to conenct to an Amazon MemoryDB for Redis cluster from an AWS Lambda function with IAM authentication. This snippet is valid for Redis engine version 7.0+.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Amazon MemoryDB for Redis is a durable database with microsecond reads, low single-digit millisecond writes, scalability, and enterprise security. Connect to a MemoryDB cluster using IAM authentication.

codeTabs.title: Copy the code into your Lambda function
codeTabs.description: Follow the AWS Lambda instructions for packaging with dependencies and uploading in .zip format. This snippet uses the ioredis library.
